about_us.title: We are a team of Wifi enthusiasts
about_us.description1: Across the world there are different legal settings and requirements for sharing of Internet connections. CommonsNet is a webiste which reflects these details and make them transparent to users.
about_us.description2: Our system enables to collect all Wifi details in a easy-to-follow wizrd form, and then based on that details generate a human readable pdf file and a machine readeable link.
about_us.mission_quote: We want people to be provided with clear data about wireless connection they use

activity.title: What we do
activity.content: We are a network of people who believe that network transparency is possible to build and we want to have an important impact on doing that. That is why we have prepared a great tool to help everyone make his or her Wifi details open and clear to everyone.

offer.title: What we can do for you
offer.content: We provide you with a great tool to make a wifi network transparent, become an important member of community and work with us for our common goal.

basic_details.title: Basic details
basic_details.content: We want people to know what are the basic settings of wireless connection like SSID, password, authentication, standard, provided service etc.

payment_and_limits.title: Payment & time limit
payment_and_limits.content: We believe people should get clear information if the wifi they want to use is paid or limited. This section helps you to provide users with clear information about your fee and other limits like data usage and time.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.content: We want also to make people aware of conditions to use wireless connection and let them know what do they need to do in order to connect to offered wifi.

labels.serviceyes: Do you provide a Wifi service?

restrictions.isp: Does ISP restrict something or block any websites in a network?
restrictions.limitdevices: Do you limit the number of devices?
restrictions.bandwidthcontrol: Do you provide a bandwidth control?

confirmation.title: Congratulations!
confirmation.content: Download your pdf file or copy code to add to your website.

inform.title: INFORM
inform.description: Collect your wifi details, put them in a form and provide a clear WiFi connection.

share.title: SHARE
share.description: Share your WiFi details in a transparent and easy-to understand way.

find.title: FIND
find.description: Let your users to find WiFi generated file supported by CommonsNet at your place.

connect.title: CONNECT
connect.description: Then let them connect to trustworthy and transparent wifi and enjoy Internet resources.

fill.title: FILL
fill.description: Collect all details about Wifi you provided and put them into an easy-to-follow form.

create.title: CREATE
create.description: As you finish filling, click save button to generate file or code and share with your customers.

enjoy.title: ENJOY
enjoy.description: Enjoy providing your customers with a transparent and trustworthy wireless connection.

section1.title: How it works
section1.content: Learn how you can use our great tool for your needs.

section2.title: Generate
section2.content: Generate your file or a code now to start providing users with a transparent Wifi details

section3.title: Visit our blog
section3.content: Find out latest news about our activity and wireless network

contact.find_out_more: Many questions are answered in our FAQ and you can find out more about our CommonsNet network and community here. If you are unable to find your answer via our FAQ or website please contact us
contact.not_office: Please note: we are a distributed team working all over the world. We donâ€™t have an office, but if you need to send us an email please use above form or send it to: commonsnet.team@gmail.com

issues.title: Reporting bugs with CommonsNet website
issues.content: You can write to us using the form above or you can create an issue on GitHub.

get_involved.title: Get involved
get_involved.content: There are numerous ways to connect with CommonsNet

share_wifi.title: Share your Wifi details
share_wifi.content: Commonsnet would do little without enthusiastic use by Wifi providers. If you share your Wifi with other people make them transparent using our great tool.

support.title: Support
support.content: CommonsNet stays alive because of support from the community Join us on GitHub.

contact.contribute: The best way to start interacting and contributing to the community is to join us on GitHub:
